name: SwinS
description:
SwinS

This project is a school project.

SwinS is a multiplayer and cooperation game.

The two players plays on the same screen but the screen is split. The top of the screen is for the player one and the bottom of the screen is for the player 2.

Each player plays a different hero who has a different element. The fisrt one plays a fire hero and the second one plays an ice hero.

The two players are separeted by a border and they cannot be on the same side of the border. However, they can changer their position in order to continue into the level. The fire player cannot spend watterfall and ice player cannot spend lava. So they have to switch.

Sorry because of the game is only in french, an update is coming to put the game in english. Moreover, the game does not have any musics for the moment because of copyright. Musics will come in a next update to.

The succes menu does not work automatically, it's coming...

Please let me a comment about my game.
Enjoy !
